Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The denizens of Vexatus Swamp are ravaging explorers and our soldiers.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:8#1011#hulking sentries}, {@LinkCreature:8#1021#cromos prowlers}, and {@LinkCreature:8#1031#Caprin imps}.

Report to Rameria in Castanica when the mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
